successes.title: Legion Meter - Charge your smartphone 92% faster
successes.description: A USB multimeter with integrated OLED display designed to accelerate your smartphone or tablet's charge speed up to 92% faster.

Pledges.description: CONNECT - Join the LEGION community to receive special updates.
EARLY BIRD - Get one Legion Meter with charge accelerator and integrated multimeter OLED display. FREE USA Shipping. Add $5 for Canada.

ADVANTAGE - If you missed our early birds, it's not too late. We're offering this special for blasting past our goal. Get one Legion Meter with charge accelerator and integrated multimeter OLED display. FREE USA Shipping. Add $5 for Canada.
ACCELERATE - Save $20. Get one Legion Meter with charge accelerator and integrated multimeter OLED display at a special Kickstarter price. FREE USA Shipping. Add $5 for Canada.
POWER UP - Save $20. Get one Legion Meter with charge accelerator and integrated multimeter OLED display at a special Kickstarter price. FREE USA Shipping. Add $5 for Canada.
RETAIL - Get one Legion Meter with charge accelerator and integrated multimeter OLED display at regular price. FREE USA Shipping. Add $5 for Canada.
